ValidationRule.description: Appeal Manager Information is required for Active/Closed Appeals. Allow Appeal Manager fields to be blank for Withdrawn Appeals since they may never have been Active.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c,"Withdrawn")), OR( ISBLANK(Appeal_Manager_First_Name__c), ISBLANK(Appeal_Manager_Last_Name__c), ISBLANK(Appeal_Manager_Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Appeal Manager Contact information is required for all Active Appeals
